00010 #include "Jamoma.h"

00012 enum outlets{
00013         k_outlet_value = 0,
00014         k_outlet_dumpout,
00015         num_outlets
00016 };

00018 
00019 typedef struct _ramp{
00020         t_object         ob;
00021         void            *obex;
00022         void            *outlets[num_outlets];
00023         t_symbol        *attr_rampunit;                 
00024         rampunit        *my_ramp;                               
00025 } t_ramp;

00050 /************************************************************************************/
00051 // Class Definition
00052 
00053 int main(void)                          // main receives a copy of the Max function macros table
00054 {
00055         t_class *c;
00056         
00057         jamoma_init();
00058 
00059         // Define our class
00060         c = class_new("jcom.ramp",(method)ramp_new, (method)ramp_free, (short)sizeof(t_ramp), (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00061         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_ramp, obex));
00062         
00063         // Make methods accessible for our class:
00064         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_int,                                    "int",                                  A_DEFLONG,      0);
00065         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_float,                                  "float",                                A_DEFFLOAT,     0);
00066         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_list,                                   "list",                                 A_GIMME,        0);
00067         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_set,                                    "set",                                  A_GIMME,        0);
00068         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_attrset,                                "attrset",                              A_GIMME,        0);
00069         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_attrget,                                "attrget",                              A_GIMME,        0);
00070         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_setFunction,                    "function",                             A_SYM,          0);
00071         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_getFunctionParameter,   "function.parameter.get",       A_GIMME,        0);
00072         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_setFunctionParameter,   "function.parameter",   A_GIMME,        0);
00073         class_addmethod(c, (method)ramp_assist,                                 "assist",                               A_CANT,         0); 
00074     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,                     "dumpout",                              A_CANT,         0);  
00075     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_quickref,            "quickref",                             A_CANT,         0);
00076 
00077         // ATTRIBUTE: rampunit
00078         class_addattr(c, 
00079                 attr_offset_new("drive", _sym_symbol, 0,
00080                 (method)0, (method)ramp_setrampunit, calcoffset(t_ramp, attr_rampunit)));
00081 
00082         // Finalize our class
00083         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00084         ramp_class = c;
00085         
00086         return 0;
00087 }

00090 /************************************************************************************/
00091 // Object Life
00092 
00093 void *ramp_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00094 {
00095         t_ramp  *x = (t_ramp *)object_alloc(ramp_class);
00096         t_atom  a;
00097 
00098         if(x){
00099                 x->outlets[k_outlet_dumpout] = outlet_new(x, 0L);
00100                 x->outlets[k_outlet_value]   = outlet_new(x, 0L);
00101                 object_obex_store((void *)x, _sym_dumpout, (t_object *)x->outlets[k_outlet_dumpout]);
00102 
00103                 x->my_ramp = NULL;
00104                 x->attr_rampunit = _sym_nothing;                
00105                 attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);       // handle attribute args
00106 
00107                 if(x->attr_rampunit == _sym_nothing){
00108                         atom_setsym(&a, gensym("scheduler"));
00109                         object_attr_setvalueof(x, gensym("drive"), 1, &a);
00110                 }
00111         }
00112         return (x);             // return the pointer to our new instantiation
00113 }
00114 
00115 
00116 void ramp_free(t_ramp *x)
00117 {
00118         delete x->my_ramp;
00119         x->my_ramp = NULL;
00120 }

00124 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00125 
00126 // Method for Assistance Messages
00127 void ramp_assist(t_ramp *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00128 {
00129         if(msg==1)                                              // Inlet
00130                 strcpy(dst, "input");
00131         else{                                                   // Outlets
00132                 switch(arg){
00133                         case k_outlet_value:
00134                                         strcpy(dst, "ramping value");
00135                                         break;
00136                         case k_outlet_dumpout:
00137                                         strcpy(dst, "dumpout");
00138                                         break;
00139                 }
00140         }               
00141 }

00144 void ramp_setFunction(t_ramp *x, t_symbol *functionName)
00145 {
00146         x->my_ramp->setFunction(functionName);
00147 }

00149 
00150 void ramp_getFunctionParameter(t_ramp *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00151 {
00152         t_symbol        *parameterName;
00153         t_atom          *a;
00154         long            ac = 0;
00155         t_atom          *av = NULL;
00156         
00157         if(!argc){
00158                 error("jcom.map: not enough arguments to getParameter");
00159                 return;
00160         }
00161         
00162         parameterName = atom_getsym(argv);
00163         //obj->function->getParameter(parameterName, &ac, &av);
00164         obj->my_ramp->getFunctionParameter(parameterName, &ac, &av);
00165         if(ac) {
00166                 //atom_setsym(a+0, parameterName);
00167                 //atom_setfloat(a+1, av);
00168                 a = (t_atom *)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_atom)*(ac+1));
00169                 // Forst list item is name of parameter
00170                 atom_setsym(a, parameterName);
00171                 // Next the whole shebang is copied
00172                 sysmem_copyptr(av, a+1, sizeof(t_atom)*ac);
00173                 object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("getParameter"), ac+1, av);
00174         
00175                 // The pointer to an atom assign in the getParameter method needs to be freed.
00176                 sysmem_freeptr(av);
00177                 sysmem_freeptr(a);
00178         }
00179 }
00180 
00181 
00182 void ramp_setFunctionParameter(t_ramp *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00183 {
00184         //double                value = 0.0;
00185         t_symbol        *parameterName;
00186         
00187         if(argc < 2){
00188                 error("jcom.map: not enough arguments to setParameter");
00189                 return;
00190         }
00191         
00192         parameterName = atom_getsym(argv);
00193         //obj->function->setParameter(parameterName, argc-1, argv+1);
00194         obj->my_ramp->setFunctionParameter(parameterName, argc-1, argv+1);
00195 }

00199 // ATTRIBUTE: set rampunit
00200 t_max_err ramp_setrampunit(t_ramp *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00201 {
00202         x->attr_rampunit = atom_getsym(argv);
00203         
00204         if(x->my_ramp)
00205                 delete x->my_ramp;
00206         x->my_ramp = new rampunit(x->attr_rampunit->s_name, ramp_callback, (void *)x);          // create ramp unit
00207         
00208         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00209         #pragma unused(attr)
00210 }
00211 
00212 
00213 // Triggered by our Ramp Unit's tick function
00214 void ramp_callback(void *v, short numvalues, double *values)
00215 {       
00216         t_ramp  *x = (t_ramp *)v;
00217         t_atom  *a = (t_atom *)malloc(numvalues * sizeof(t_atom));
00218         short   i;
00219         
00220         for(i=0; i<numvalues; i++)
00221                 atom_setfloat(a+i, values[i]);
00222                 
00223         if(numvalues == 1)
00224                 outlet_float(x->outlets[k_outlet_value], values[0]);
00225         else
00226                 outlet_anything(x->outlets[k_outlet_value], _sym_list, numvalues, a);
00227                 
00228         free(a);
00229 }
00230

00232 // INT INPUT
00233 void ramp_int(t_ramp *x, long value)
00234 {
00235         double dval = value;
00236         
00237         x->my_ramp->set(1, &dval);
00238         outlet_float(x->outlets[k_outlet_value], value);
00239 }
00240 
00241 
00242 // FLOAT INPUT
00243 void ramp_float(t_ramp *x, double value)
00244 {
00245         x->my_ramp->set(1, &value);
00246         outlet_float(x->outlets[k_outlet_value], value);
00247 }

00249 
00250 // SET FLOAT INPUT
00251 void ramp_set(t_ramp *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00252 {
00253         double  *values;
00254         short   i;
00255         
00256         values = (double *)malloc(argc * sizeof(double));
00257 
00258         for(i=0; i<argc; i++)
00259                 values[i] = atom_getfloat(argv+i);
00260 
00261         x->my_ramp->set(argc, values);
00262         free(values);
00263 }
00264 
00265 
00266 // LIST INPUT <value, ramptime>
00267 void ramp_list(t_ramp *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00268 {
00269         short   i;
00270         short   ramp_keyword_index = -1;
00271         double  *values;
00272         
00273         if(argc < 3){
00274                 error("invalid syntax -- not enough args to ramp");
00275                 return;
00276         }
00277 
00278         values = (double *)malloc((argc-2) * sizeof(double));
00279         
00280         for(i=0; i<argc; i++){
00281                 if(argv[i].a_type == A_SYM){
00282                         if(atom_getsym(argv+i) == gensym("ramp")){
00283                                 ramp_keyword_index = i;
00284                                 break;
00285                         }
00286                 }
00287                 values[i] = atom_getfloat(argv+i);
00288         }
00289         
00290         if(argc != (ramp_keyword_index + 2)){
00291                 error("invalid syntax -- missing 'ramp' keyword or wrong args following the 'ramp' keyword");
00292                 return;
00293         }
00294         
00295         x->my_ramp->go(argc-2, values, atom_getfloat(argv+ramp_keyword_index+1));
00296         free(values);
00297 }

00300 // RAMP UNIT ATTRIBUTES
00301 void ramp_attrset(t_ramp *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00302 {
00303         short   err = 0;
00304         
00305         if(argc != 2){
00306                 error("jcom.ramp::attrset -- bad arguments");
00307                 return;
00308         }
00309         err = x->my_ramp->attrset(atom_getsym(argv), atom_getfloat(argv+1));
00310 }
00311 
00312 
00313 void ramp_attrget(t_ramp *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00314 {
00315         short   err = 0;
00316         
00317         if(argc != 1){
00318                 error("jcom.ramp::attrset -- bad arguments");
00319                 return;
00320         }
00321 
00322         double value;
00323         
00324         err = x->my_ramp->attrget(atom_getsym(argv), &value);
00325         if(!err)
00326                 outlet_float(x->outlets[k_outlet_dumpout], value);
00327 }
